title: Alisha-k
author: Alisha-k
content: Nothing good comes easily, I've doubted the truth in this statement for a while now and here am to ask, who else believes in the statement or wgp doesn't, whichever way, why??

comments.author: Raceonsucced
comments.body: Nothing good comes easy...I think good things always have a test. So, all good things that come must have a silver lining, namely being grateful. And if the test comes, there must be a lesson too, which is to be patient.And what I always remember, when we experience difficulties there must be happiness. So, what we need to improve is struggle, patience, and gratitude.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: Alisha-k on May 16, 2023, 05:50:46 AMNothing good comes easily, I've doubted the truth in this statement for a while now and here am to ask, who else believes in the statement or wgp doesn't, whichever way, why??It's always true that nothing good comes easy, which means for you to be successful in life, there are standards you must set in pursuit of them and pay every demands it involves, at the end of the day, people will only see you being successful but they wouldn't know the huge sacrifice you have given or contributed before getting to where you are, that's why they use to say, behind every goory, there's always a story.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Alisha-k on May 16, 2023, 05:50:46 AMNothing good comes easily, I've doubted the truth in this statement for a while now and here am to ask, who else believes in the statement or wgp doesn't, whichever way, why??It basically means that if you are not willing to do any work, don't assume that there will be progress done for you. It's about responsibility. Of course people can get more good things that they "deserve" without doing any work for it, but that's also a matter of perspective. Some people appreciate those things as good things and some take them for granted. So they don't even realize what they are getting for free.But if you want some specific new things in your life, without any plan those wants will be just dreams. With a plan (work), they can become reality.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Quote from: Alisha-k on May 16, 2023, 05:50:46 AMNothing good comes easily, I've doubted the truth in this statement for a while now and here am to ask, who else believes in the statement or wgp doesn't, whichever way, why??I think it's true. Even generational wealth that had been past down to a more recent family was hard earned through forefathers and what have you.Good things are always hard to come by so when it comes, you learn to value it, safe guard it and hope not to waste all efforts in your time.Everyone is out here seeking better and hopes to pass better down to there later generations too. It never meant no one didn't work for it.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: It's true that nothing good comes easy. Let's take the case of money for instance; you have to toil very hard to get it so that you can learn a valuable lesson and this guides you on how to spend it since you know hard you struggled to get it. I also believe that if one doesn't encounter difficulty when going for something good, it won't be appreciated.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: I believe it is possible for good things to come relatively easily by pure good luck or chance, however, those things which come easily also can disappear and leave us before we notice. That is one of the reasons some people who win the lottery end in bankruptcy eventually.The things we work hard for are more likely to stay, because we know the effort and investment behind them. In this world where bad things seem to be all around, we need to pay attention to good ones and do what we can to keep them existing in our life.

comments.body: Well, the statement is right. That's why you see the majority of the people are hardworking for the sake of their good. If the good is just coming easily then we'll always have that thought that we shouldn't work hard and smart anymore because things do come easily. We're living in an unfair world and this is the reality that should sink in for everybody if you want to have for the greater good, it doesn't grow like mushrooms but it grows like trees, stably, patiently, and hardly.

comments.author: Stepstowealth
comments.body: Quote from: Alisha-k on May 16, 2023, 05:50:46 AMNothing good comes easily, I've doubted the truth in this statement for a while now and here am to ask, who else believes in the statement or wgp doesn't, whichever way, why??Some good things can come easily depending on where you are that is your position in life, who you are and who you know. For some people, some other people have already paid the price for the good life and opportunity, so for these people good things easily come their way because they are privileged.

comments.author: Dzwaafu11
comments.body: Quote from: Alisha-k on May 16, 2023, 05:50:46 AMNothing good comes easily, I've doubted the truth in this statement for a while now and here am to ask, who else believes in the statement or wgp doesn't, whichever way, why??Imagine coming to these forums and receiving some bitcoin without having to work for them or learn about it going through a lot of different strategies and difficulties that involve in the Bitcoin business. How did you think you will use that money? I believe you will be thinking of using it without a proper plan. So If anything good comes your way in a very easy way without you stressing yourself, believe me you are going to misuse that thing you won't use it in such a manner way. However, if you go through hardship before obtaining something, you should always keep in mind that what you experienced was likely similar to the stress of finishing school before landing a job and beginning to earn a salary. In this case, I believe the first thought that comes to mind is to make plans for how you will spend your salary wisely in light of your academic experiences.

comments.author: Doan9269

For instance if you need  a white caller job with a very high pay you'll need an outstanding academic performance and we all know the effort one has to take to attain that.i can as well say living is good but life itself is hard to create.For you to achieve something in life, it's either you're given due to the values you've created or an inherited virtue from your parents or ancestors or by what you have struggled and worked for to achieve in life, nothing is free, even a lazy man does not have right to eat as long as he's lazy, we have to pay for the sacrifice needed to develop something through our creativity, remember this noble platform that accomodate us today was created by someone out of passion amd love for everyone using bitcoin to have a discussion platform all over the world bringing us together.

comments.author: Iadegbola34
comments.body: "Nothing good comes easily" is often true in many spheres of life. While some may have questioned its veracity, there are reasons why many others accept it. A worthwhile goal usually requires devotion, effort, and perseverance. We often grow, learn, and ultimately achieve goals by overcoming obstacles and disappointments. The road to success is rarely easy, and the hardships we face along the way make the accomplishments all the more satisfying. However, keep in mind that everyone is experiences and perspectives differ. Some people may have followed alternative life routes in which they encountered more advantageous conditions or opportunities, making their trips easier. Thus, it is understandable that people have different perspectives on this issue.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Iadegbola34 on May 25, 2023, 05:23:05 PMThe road to success is rarely easy, and the hardships we face along the way make the accomplishments all the more satisfying. This is true and this is the reason why people acknowledge hard work, and even label the earned income of everybody who works hard for it as "hard-earned money". It's because everyone recognizes that everything that's good doesn't come too easy.Quote from: Iadegbola34 on May 25, 2023, 05:23:05 PMHowever, keep in mind that everyone is experiences and perspectives differ. Some people may have followed alternative life routes in which they encountered more advantageous conditions or opportunities, making their trips easier. Thus, it is understandable that people have different perspectives on this issue. Yeah, there are people that have easier paths but don't be discouraged if you see some of those in your path. Instead of being jealous or thinking that this life is unfair because it actually is, use that as a motivation and you'll also get there wherever they are now someday.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: Yes, good things don't come easy OP because if good things come easy to you, you will not value them than to use them anyhow in a way it will lead many people to wrong things. There are many people who are using their parents inheritance anyhow because they don't know how struggle their parents struggle to get all those wealth for their children to enjoy and improve the wealth in future.  Now that the price of BTC is decreasing gradually, hard working investors are struggling to improve their investment so that when the price go higher they will have good results to achieve and to encourage others never to give up because there is a big reward ahead.

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: Quote from: Alisha-k on May 16, 2023, 05:50:46 AMNothing good comes easily, I've doubted the truth in this statement for a while now and here am to ask, who else believes in the statement or wgp doesn't, whichever way, why??These statement is a word of motivation to those who thinks they can just be successful by doing nothing or by doing things without putting much effort but they always expect positive returns or rewards. The statement is true no need to doubt again because almost everyone in life have come across certain challenges in one way or the other but your ability to endure and continue working hard remains the only way you can come out with a good result. In order for you not to give up when when your not getting the right results, when you think your doing more than enough but nothing is working, when life is becoming so difficult for you that you can understand, this statement will help to encourage you because truely nothing good comes easily.

comments.author: Qiubell5
comments.body: because everything needs a process. For example, if you plant strawberries, you need to take very good care of them so that they bear fruit later. however, if you want your strawberries but don't care for them at all, chances are they won't bear fruit. therefore, process is very important. it's okay if the process is slow, but you have to keep going and not stop in the middle.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: Alisha-k on May 16, 2023, 05:50:46 AMNothing good comes easily, I've doubted the truth in this statement for a while now and here am to ask, who else believes in the statement or wgp doesn't, whichever way, why??Nothing good comes easy is a motivational statement that reminds us that we always need to put some effort to achieve a particular goal or aspiration. It reminds us not to cut corners or follow illegal shortcuts to pursue our desires. You don't need to doubt the truth in this statement because it is the truth. I know many people are making money or getting success by not putting in any effort because they can manipulate the system and achieve their aims. Most investors or businesses men failed so many times but they kept on working until they achieved success. If you start doubting this statement it might lead to laziness and the pursuit of illegal wealth. I know it is very discouraging to see people that don't work as hard as you do getting more results than you do. But you don't have to give up because nothing good comes easy. If you want to have success, them you must work hard.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: So what do you make of the statement applying it to your own life,  because for you to have anything then you have to earn it and at that, you must work for it and to make the maximum then you must work extra hard to stay on the top take for example?To attain first-class grade as an undergraduate,  the student needs to work extra hard and to be able to beat every other student to score the highest point in the total exams and this is something that doesn't comes easy at all because the student will have to send many sleepless nights to study in other to attain that position. So I am of the same school of thought that nothing good comes easy and whatever you earn you have to work for it.

comments.author: Sakanwa
comments.body: I agree with the OP that nothing good comes easily,  because something that's worth having is sometimes not easily gotten, for instance to achieve success you need to work hard with good discipline and commitment to get to the peak , though in life, there are three kinds of people.  First set of people are  those that makes little effort at the first trial but still get their goals. The second set of people are those that makes effort but still faces little challenges and encounter one or two trials but still get there goals on the long run Lastly are those people that seems like luck is never on their side, they work very hard more than the first and second set of people and archive little success.  But whether you fall under any of these set of people, you still need to work to achieve success whether you put in less effort or not. Life itself is not a bed of roses it's still full of struggles, hoodles and trials.
